info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 5:02AM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain and freezing drizzle. Ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions. Although ice amounts will be light, the freezing rain may fall on cold bare pavement. This will lead to the potential for glaze ice formation on untreated roads, leading to extremely dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
